.class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit IntBuffer extends Java.Nio.Buffer implements class Android.Runtime.IJavaObject, class Java.Lang.IComparable, class System.IDisposable

Docs.summary: A buffer of ints.

remarks.para: A buffer of ints.

Docs.param: A containing a Java Native Interface (JNI) object reference.
Docs.summary: A constructor used when creating managed representations of JNI objects; called by the runtime.

remarks.para: This constructor is invoked by the runtime infrastructure () to create a new managed representation for a Java Native Interface object.
The constructor will initializes the property of the new instance using and .

MemberSignature.Value: public static Java.Nio.IntBuffer Allocate (int capacity);
.method public static hidebysig class Java.Nio.IntBuffer Allocate(int32 capacity) cil managed

Docs.param: the capacity of the new buffer.
Docs.summary: Creates an int buffer based on a newly allocated int array.

remarks.para: Creates an int buffer based on a newly allocated int array.

Docs.exception: if capacity is less than zero.

MemberSignature.Value: public override sealed int ArrayOffset ();
.method public hidebysig virtual instance int32 ArrayOffset() cil managed

Docs.summary: Returns the offset into the array returned by array of the first element of the buffer (optional operation).

remarks.para: Returns the offset into the array returned by array of the first element of the buffer (optional operation). The backing array (if there is one) is not necessarily the same size as the buffer, and position 0 in the buffer is not necessarily the 0th element in the array. Use buffer.array()[offset + buffer.arrayOffset() to access element offset in buffer.
Use hasArray to ensure this method won't throw. (A separate call to isReadOnly is not necessary.)

MemberSignature.Value: public abstract Java.Nio.IntBuffer AsReadOnlyBuffer ();
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Java.Nio.IntBuffer AsReadOnlyBuffer() cil managed

Docs.summary: Returns a read-only buffer that shares its content with this buffer.

remarks.para: Returns a read-only buffer that shares its content with this buffer.
The returned buffer is guaranteed to be a new instance, even this buffer is read-only itself. The new buffer's position, limit, capacity and mark are the same as this buffer's.
The new buffer shares its content with this buffer, which means this buffer's change of content will be visible to the new buffer. The two buffer's position, limit and mark are independent.

MemberSignature.Value: public abstract Java.Nio.IntBuffer Compact ();
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Java.Nio.IntBuffer Compact() cil managed

Docs.summary: Compacts this int buffer.

remarks.para: Compacts this int buffer.
The remaining ints will be moved to the head of the buffer, starting from position zero. Then the position is set to remaining(); the limit is set to capacity; the mark is cleared.

Docs.exception: if no changes may be made to the contents of this buffer.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual int CompareTo (Java.Nio.IntBuffer otherBuffer);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance int32 CompareTo(class Java.Nio.IntBuffer otherBuffer) cil managed

Docs.summary: Compares the remaining ints of this buffer to another int buffer's remaining ints.

remarks.para: Compares the remaining ints of this buffer to another int buffer's remaining ints.

Docs.exception: if other is not an int buffer.

MemberSignature.Value: public abstract Java.Nio.IntBuffer Duplicate ();
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Java.Nio.IntBuffer Duplicate() cil managed

Docs.summary: Returns a duplicated buffer that shares its content with this buffer.

remarks.para: Returns a duplicated buffer that shares its content with this buffer.
The duplicated buffer's position, limit, capacity and mark are the same as this buffer. The duplicated buffer's read-only property and byte order are the same as this buffer's.
The new buffer shares its content with this buffer, which means either buffer's change of content will be visible to the other. The two buffers' position, limit and mark are independent.

Docs.summary: Returns the int at the current position and increases the position by 1.

Docs.exception: if the position is equal or greater than limit.

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance int32 Get(int32 index) cil managed

Docs.param: the index, must not be negative and less than limit.
Docs.summary: Returns an int at the specified index; the position is not changed.

Docs.exception: if index is invalid.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual Java.Nio.IntBuffer Get (int[] dest);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Java.Nio.IntBuffer Get(int32[] dest) cil managed

Docs.summary: Reads ints from the current position into the specified int array and increases the position by the number of ints read.

remarks.para: Reads ints from the current position into the specified int array and increases the position by the number of ints read.
Calling this method has the same effect as get(dst, 0, dst.length).

Docs.exception: if dst.length is greater than remaining().

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual Java.Nio.IntBuffer Get (int[] dest, int off, int len);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Java.Nio.IntBuffer Get(int32[] dest, int32 off, int32 len) cil managed

Docs.summary: Reads ints from the current position into the specified int array, starting from the specified offset, and increases the position by the number of ints read.

remarks.para: Reads ints from the current position into the specified int array, starting from the specified offset, and increases the position by the number of ints read.

Docs.exception: if either dstOffset or intCount is invalid.
if intCount is greater than remaining().

MemberSignature.Value: public override bool HasArray { get; }
.property instance bool HasArray

Docs.summary: Returns true if array and arrayOffset won't throw.

remarks.para: Returns true if array and arrayOffset won't throw. This method does not return true for buffers not backed by arrays because the other methods would throw UnsupportedOperationException, nor does it return true for buffers backed by read-only arrays, because the other methods would throw ReadOnlyBufferException.

MemberSignature.Value: public abstract Java.Nio.ByteOrder Order ();
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Java.Nio.ByteOrder Order() cil managed

Docs.summary: Returns the byte order used by this buffer when converting ints from/to bytes.

remarks.para: Returns the byte order used by this buffer when converting ints from/to bytes.
If this buffer is not based on a byte buffer, then always return the platform's native byte order.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual Java.Nio.IntBuffer Put (Java.Nio.IntBuffer src);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Java.Nio.IntBuffer Put(class Java.Nio.IntBuffer src) cil managed

Docs.summary: Writes all the remaining ints of the src int buffer to this buffer's current position, and increases both buffers' position by the number of ints copied.

remarks.para: Writes all the remaining ints of the src int buffer to this buffer's current position, and increases both buffers' position by the number of ints copied.

Docs.exception: if src.remaining() is greater than this buffer's remaining().
if src is this buffer.
if no changes may be made to the contents of this buffer.

MemberSignature.Value: public abstract Java.Nio.IntBuffer Put (int i);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Java.Nio.IntBuffer Put(int32 i) cil managed

Docs.summary: Writes the given int to the current position and increases the position by 1.

remarks.para: Writes the given int to the current position and increases the position by 1.

Docs.exception: if position is equal or greater than limit.
if no changes may be made to the contents of this buffer.

MemberSignature.Value: public Java.Nio.IntBuffer Put (int[] src);
.method public hidebysig instance class Java.Nio.IntBuffer Put(int32[] src) cil managed

Docs.summary: Writes ints from the given int array to the current position and increases the position by the number of ints written.

remarks.para: Writes ints from the given int array to the current position and increases the position by the number of ints written.
Calling this method has the same effect as put(src, 0, src.length).

Docs.exception: if remaining() is less than src.length.
if no changes may be made to the contents of this buffer.

if no changes may be made to the contents of this buffer.

MemberSignature.Value: public abstract Java.Nio.IntBuffer Slice ();
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Java.Nio.IntBuffer Slice() cil managed

Docs.summary: Returns a sliced buffer that shares its content with this buffer.

remarks.para: Returns a sliced buffer that shares its content with this buffer.

The sliced buffer's capacity will be this buffer's remaining(), and its zero position will correspond to this buffer's current position. The new buffer's position will be 0, limit will be its capacity, and its mark is cleared. The new buffer's read-only property and byte order are same as this buffer's.
The new buffer shares its content with this buffer, which means either buffer's change of content will be visible to the other. The two buffers' position, limit and mark are independent.

MemberSignature.Value: protected override IntPtr ThresholdClass { get; }
.property instance native int ThresholdClass

Docs.summary: This API supports the Mono for Android infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
Docs.value: A which contains the java.lang.Class JNI value corresponding to this type.

remarks.para: This property is used to control which jclass is provided to methods like .

MemberSignature.Value: protected override Type ThresholdType { get; }
.property instance class System.Type ThresholdType

Docs.summary: This API supports the Mono for Android infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
Docs.value: A which provides the declaring type.

remarks.para: This property is used to control virtual vs. non virtual method dispatch against the underlying JNI object. When this property is equal to the declaring type, then virtual method invocation against the JNI object is performed; otherwise, we assume that the method was overridden by a derived type, and perform non-virtual methdo invocation.

MemberSignature.Value: public static Java.Nio.IntBuffer Wrap (int[] array);
.method public static hidebysig class Java.Nio.IntBuffer Wrap(int32[] array) cil managed

Docs.param: the int array which the new buffer will be based on.
Docs.summary: Creates a new int buffer by wrapping the given int array.

remarks.para: Creates a new int buffer by wrapping the given int array.
Calling this method has the same effect as wrap(array, 0, array.length).

MemberSignature.Value: public static Java.Nio.IntBuffer Wrap (int[] array, int start, int len);
.method public static hidebysig class Java.Nio.IntBuffer Wrap(int32[] array, int32 start, int32 len) cil managed

Docs.param: the int array which the new buffer will be based on.
the start index, must not be negative and not greater than array.length
Docs.summary: Creates a new int buffer by wrapping the given int array.

remarks.para: Creates a new int buffer by wrapping the given int array.
The new buffer's position will be start, limit will be start + intCount, capacity will be the length of the array.

Docs.exception: if either start or intCount is invalid.
